description: From Middle English undirstondingli, understandandly, equivalent to understanding +‎ -ly.

adverbs.description: understandingly (comparative more understandingly, superlative most understandingly)

entries.meaning: In an understanding manner; with empathy.
(obsolete) In a way that can be understood; intelligibly.
examples: Garcias ab Horto writes of one whom he saw at Goa in the East Indies, that took ten drams of opium in three days; and yet consulto loquebatur, spake understandingly  […]
